~~~typescript
/**traverse: gets depdencies recursively
    o: entry value
    getdeps: a function that returns direct dependencies from given value
    options:
       key: if the entry values are not string, provide some function that gives unique string for the value.
       circular: called when there is circular denendency. default throws error
    returns: all dependencies traversable from o    
*/
export function traverse<T>(o:T, getdeps:(o:T)=>Promise<T[]>,opt?:Options<T>):Promise<T[]>;
export function traverse<T>(o:T, getdeps:(o:T)=>T[],opt?:Options<T>):T[];
type Options<T>={
    key?:(t:T)=>string,
    circular?:(t:T)=>T[],
};
~~~
